title: President, PM praise security forces for Awaran operation
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 16 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday commended the security forces for a successful operation against “Fitna-al-Hindustan” in Awaran, Balochistan province.
The president and the prime minister praised the professionalism of the security forces for sending three terrorists of ‘Fitna-al-Hindustan’ to hell during the operation, the President Secretariat and PM Office Media Wings said in separate press releases.
The president and the prime minister also paid tribute to Major Syed Rab Nawaz Tariq, who embraced martyrdom while fighting bravely against terrorists.
The president and the prime minister prayed for the elevation of the martyr’s ranks and the grant of patience and fortitude for the bereaved family.
The president said that the nation would always remember the sacrifices of its shuhada and reiterated the firm resolve to complete elimination of terrorists and elements of Fitna al Hindustan.
The security forces would continue their operations against terrorists till their complete eradication, he added.
“We will continue the fight against the scourge of terrorism till it is completely eradicated from the country,” the press release quoted the prime minister as saying.
He said that the entire nation, including himself, was proud of their martyrs and their families, adding the officers and soldiers of Pakistan Army were dedicated to foil the nefarious designs of the enemy.
“In the fight against terrorism, the entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with our brave armed forces,” he further added.
